Package com.xorprogramming.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameEngine<T>
    A simple interface that lets a game engine be updated
    GameEventController<T>
    An interface that can notify listeners of game events.
    GameEventListener<T1 extends GameEngine<T2>,T2>
    A listener interface for responding to game events.
    GameRenderer<T extends GameEngine<?>>
    An interface providing the basic framework for rendering a GameEngine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameActivity<T extends GameView<?,?>>
    An Activity that simply holds a GameView.
    GameView<T1 extends GameEngine<T2>,T2>
    A View that manages the rendering and updating of a game.
    SimpleRenderingActivity<T extends GameView<?,?>>
    An Activity that completely manages a GameView.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RenderException
    Signals an error that occurred while handling rendering.
